text: 2067 (MMLXVII) will be . ==Predicted and scheduled events== * January 1 â€“ Books, movies, and other works published in 1971 will enter the public domain in the United States. * February 15: If copyright law doesn't change, all sound recordings fixed before February 15, 1972 will enter the public domain in the U.S. * October 18: 100th anniversary of The Jungle Book. * 100th anniversary of the New York Lottery. ==References== Category:2067
